class.name: DojoHelpers
class.brief_description: A collection of static helper functions for the Dojo SDK.
class.description: This class provides various utility functions for common tasks, such as type conversions and configuration management.

method.name: bytes_to_i128_string
method.description: Converts a [PackedByteArray] to a string representation of a 128-bit signed integer.

method.name: bytes_to_u128_string
method.description: Converts a [PackedByteArray] to a string representation of a 128-bit unsigned integer.

method.name: bytes_to_u256_string
method.description: Converts a [PackedByteArray] to a string representation of a 256-bit unsigned integer.

method.name: double_to_variant_fp
method.description: Converts a float to a fixed-point [Variant] with the specified precision.

method.name: fixed_to_float
method.description: Converts a fixed-point integer to a float with the specified precision.

method.name: fixed_to_float_64
method.description: Converts a 64-bit fixed-point integer to a float.

method.name: fixed_to_float_128
method.description: Converts a 128-bit fixed-point integer to a float.

method.name: fixed_to_float_256
method.description: Converts a 256-bit fixed-point integer to a float.

method.name: float_to_fixed
method.description: Converts a float to a fixed-point integer with the specified precision.

method.name: float_to_fixed_64
method.description: Converts a float to a 64-bit fixed-point integer.

method.name: float_to_fixed_128
method.description: Converts a float to a 128-bit fixed-point integer.

method.name: float_to_fixed_256
method.description: Converts a float to a 256-bit fixed-point integer.

method.name: get_default_policies
method.description: Returns the default policies for the Dojo SDK.

method.name: get_setting
method.description: Gets the value of a setting.

method.name: signed_to_u32_offset
method.description: Converts a signed integer to a u32 offset.

method.name: u32_to_signed_offset
method.description: Converts a u32 value to a signed offset.

method.name: variant_to_double_fp
method.description: Converts a fixed-point [Variant] to a float with the specified precision.
